  * Taken (2008)) - A thrilling action movie about a man who is trying desperately to be certified insane during World War II, so he can stop flying missions.

Through good times and bad, he has pushed on to become the two time world beard champion. He shares this inspirational story with us and guides us through his world in a 6 minute narrative doc. He considers what his world has become due to his beard and contemplates the thought of a world without.
  * Passion (2011)) - A romantic drama about a young man named Jack Passion, who is struggling to find love after his girlfriend leaves him. As he navigates through the ups and downs of his relationship journey, Jack discovers that true love comes from within oneself and that it is not something that can be found by looking outside oneself.
